# kong-gateway_basic_auth (Resource)

BasicAuth Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "kong-gateway_basic_auth" "my_basicauth" {
  consumer = {
    id = "...my_id..."
  }
  id       = "...my_id..."
  password = "...my_password..."
  tags = [
    "..."
  ]
  username = "...my_username..."
}
```
